comment: Low resolution atmosphere only; stochastic physics scheme SPPT turned on

source:
EC-Earth3 (2017): 
aerosol: none
atmos: IFS cy36r4 (TL255; linearly reduced Gaussian grid; 512 x 256 longitude/latitude; 91 levels; top level 0.01 hPa)
atmosChem: none
land: HTESSEL (land surface scheme built in IFS)
landIce: none
ocean: NEMO3.6 (ORCA1; tripolar primarily 1 deg with meridional refinement down to 1/3 degree in the tropics; 362 x 292 longitude/latitude; 75 levels; top grid cell 0-1 m)
ocnBgchem: none
seaIce: LIM3
variant_info: physics: SPPT stochastic physics scheme; forcing: Nat.Ant.
